node.name: ch-2
node.rich_text:
• Creating the table database or object of database • How data will be stored including row column name datatype rules or constraints such as not null primary key check • Constraint help to maintain consistency and avoid repetition
◇ CREATE TABLE table_name ◇ (Coulmn1 datatype(size) PRIMARY KEY,Coulmn2 datatype(size)CHECK(Age>=0 AND Age<=99));
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- CREATE TABLE table_name( CustomerID INT PRIMARY KEY, CustomerName VARCHAR(50), Age INT CHECK(Age>= 0 AND Age<=90)); ◇ coulmnname datatype constraint -> Format
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE table_name | (F_N -- | L_N-- | ) F_n,L_n PRIMARY KEY; |
------------------------------------------------------- ◇ desc table_name or describe table_name to describe structure of table
